post_content:
Offered here is a Sovereign 150 backed T206 cards of Buck Herzog. Touched Corners and light wrinkling in the corners (hard to see with the naked eye or in the scan) . Overall a great looking card. Sovereign 150's always seem tougher to find then the 350's and these are no exception. The Herzog has 12 in the PSA Pop Report and none higher than 5. Add 6.00 for shipping with tracking . Prices are net. 

Davis Sold
Herzog  Sold
Have emailed about the H. Davis. Thanks! B
